hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the path to #the Tower#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# can be found at #Gerudo's Fortress#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that Sheik waits in the #Death Mountain Crater# to teach #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Early Torches Silver Rupee Near Torch

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that ##Lon Lon Ranch## has #3# major items.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Water Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Bomb Flower Platform Chest

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo Valley# is a foolish choice.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Forest Temple Falling Ceiling Room Chest

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##Zora's Domain## has #1# major item.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Hookshot# and #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Field# is a foolish choice.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the path to #the Key#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: This hint is in another castle.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Bottom of the Well Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Front Chest

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides the #Carpenters' Boss House#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that a spider high #above the icy waters# holds #a Deku Stick#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #an Ocarina#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Lens of Truth#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: KF GS Know It All House

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# and #a Recovery Heart#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #King Dodongo# holds...^ #the Serenade of Water# and #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the path of #time#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Lens of Truth#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals the #Fishing Pond#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #an Ocarina#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Phantom Ganon# holds...^ #Zelda's Lullaby# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Hookshot#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Map Chest

ZR (Open Grotto).text: I wanna be a rocketship, @! Please help me live my dreams!
